categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Randescent was a male Human who served as an officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, he was stationed at the Imperial Garrison, where he distributed armor to other Imperial forces.
Randescent appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
